hero.core_tension: Decision to replace a sitewide percent-off with BNPL + app-cashback for a Black Friday weekend pop-up; conversion depends on payment-account linking and delayed loyalty token issuance, creating a narrow window for operators to capture app-linked enrollments.
hero.setting: Pop-up retail interior, three-quarter low angle, subject: operator and studio lead leaning over a test counter; materials: matte signage, brushed-steel fixtures, folded paper schedules; clean negative space around action.
hero.persona: Retail operator (ops manager) and studio art director collaborating on launch execution.
hero.action: Arranging physical loyalty tokens and signage, rehearsing handoff gestures, calibrating checkout choreography (no literal screens).
hero.urgency_symbol: Sequential bands of light and shrinking shadow channels that visually compress from wide to narrow, suggesting a closing opportunity and staged timing windows.
props: stacked sample packages and bundled offers
folded paper campaign cards with campaign id
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights, key-side rim light and soft backfill to emphasize hands and materials; clean negative space.
hero.alt: Operators in a pop-up; narrowing light bands suggest critical holiday timing.

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings and radial arcs with a lattice of paths; three-tier geometry (frontline → payment handoff → loyalty issuance) with layered depth.
elements: pathway overlays for footfall and staffing pulses (S1–S5 mapped)
signal_map.motion: Radial flow from storefront edge inward, nodes pulse sequentially with staggered intensity to imply capture-to-reconcile latency and hourly/daypart peaks.
signal_map.palette: Warm neutrals and cool steel accents; materials: matte paper, soft-gloss metal, translucent gels for light bands.
signal_map.alt: Abstract map of pulsing nodes and arcs linking campaign actions to loyalty.

case_studies.scene: Storefront planning huddle, medium angle, subject: operations lead and store manager at a windowed counter; materials: printed hourly staffing charts, queue rope sample, paper footfall tokens.
case_studies.moment: Decision point about a 10-day holiday pop-up (Black Friday → Cyber Week) where hourly staffing and capture windows are being aligned to hit a 20% footfall uplift KPI.
case_studies.persona: Retail brand operations lead and store manager coordinating staffing and measurement cadence.
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial side lighting with confident highlights on faces and paper textures; intentional negative space to isolate the huddle.
case_studies.alt: Store ops and manager amid staged light pulses that mark high-footfall windows.

case_studies.scene: Studio test table, overhead three-quarter angle, subject: brand owner and creative producer prototyping a micro-advent reveal; materials: sealed envelopes, numbered slots, textured wrapping paper.
case_studies.moment: A gating decision for a 12-day micro-advent where one premium reveal requires loyalty signup; timing tension is visualized as sequential reveal shadows rather than literal timers.
case_studies.persona: Brand owner and studio creative producer iterating reveal mechanics and loyalty capture phrasing.
case_studies.lighting: Warm directional spotlight with crisp shadow edges to emphasize reveal slots and tactile materials.
case_studies.mood: Playful rigor: experimental, focused, slightly anticipatory.
case_studies.alt: Brand owner and studio testing sequential reveal shadows for micro-advent gating.

case_studies.scene: Co-branded merch alignment, low-angle three-quarter shot, subject: two brand reps and a studio lead arranging dual-tone displays; materials: mixed textiles, co-branded tags, bundled offer samples.
case_studies.moment: Final alignment for a 7-day co-branded pop-up (heritage × fast-fashion) where co-marketing choices and instant loyalty incentives must preserve AOV while driving incremental enrollments.
case_studies.persona: Two-brand operator reps and studio collaboration lead finalizing shelf choreography and loyalty incentive placement.
props: bundled offer samples and in-store signage mockups (no screens)
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial rim and fill with confident highlights on textures; clean negative space separates brand elements.
case_studies.alt: Two brand reps aligning co-branded displays; layered highlights imply tight launch.
